arts.ttl: Paul Warne issues Derby County verdict and makes 'honking' comment in fine QPR win
arts.sum: Paul Warne said he was "really pleased" with Derby County's victory over QPR after admitting injuries had left their squad looking threadbare. I thought we just played a little bit too soft.

arts.ttl: Derby County player ratings v QPR as brilliant Rams seal win
arts.sum: Kenzo Goudmijn then picked out the run of Mendez-Laing whose cross was cleared from under his own bar by Dunne and the best chance came when the winger picked up a pass from Jerry Yates and slipped a ball across the face of goal, but nobody was on hand to tap in. After Jimmy Dunne had sliced a cross at his own goalkeeper, Craig Forsyth dragged a shot wide of the far post following a smart attack involving Marcus Harness and Kayden Jackson.

arts.ttl: Marcus Harness scores first Derby goal in win over QPR
arts.sum: Curtis Nelson was also on target for the Rams.

arts.ttl: Paul Warne names Derby County team to face QPR as duo absent
arts.sum: Derby: Zetterstrom, Nyambe, Nelson, Cashin, Forsyth; Goudmijn, Harness, Adams; Mendez-Laing, Yates, Jackson Nathaniel Mendez-Laing, Kayden Jackson, Ryan Nyambe and Craig Forsyth all return to the line-up with Nat Phillips and Kane Wilson dropping to the bench.

arts.ttl: Derby County v QPR live updates and team news from Pride Park
arts.sum: Join our Derby County WhatsApp group to get the latest Rams headlines sent straight to your phone. Derby County will be hoping to head into the international break with a victory under their belt as they face QPR at Pride Park this afternoon.

arts.ttl: Defender who swapped Nottingham Forest for Derby County left in limbo after transfer decision
arts.sum: Former Derby County defender Kieron Freeman is facing uncertainty after Hartlepool United opted against extending his contract. "Hartlepool United can confirm the departure of Kieron Freeman upon the expiration of his short-term contract," said the club in a statement.

arts.ttl: QPR boss issues Derby County verdict amid 'angry' demand
arts.sum: Cifuentes is expecting a response from Derby and the Hoops boss said: "After a defeat, what we want to do is play the next game. QPR's start to the season has caused some friction among the fans and Cifuentes added: "I have said many times, we need to be angry when we lose games, it is fair.

arts.ttl: Steve Cook comments, injustice and why Derby County should be fired up for QPR
arts.sum: Derby County will look to arrest a run of three straight defeats in the Championship tomorrow when they tackle QPR at Pride Park in the final game before the international break. The defeat to Norwich City last weekend ended Derby's 100 per cent home record in the Championship, but the strong smell of injustice still hangs in the air particularly after the PGMOL's response this week.

arts.ttl: Derby County defy £19m expectation amid £84m Luton Town shocker
arts.sum: Oxford are currently the best performing team in the Championship when squad value is compared to league position with the Us being 12 places better off. Transfermarkt have estimated that Derby's current squad value is around £19m which puts them 22nd in the Championship when judging the teams who have the most valuable group of players.

arts.ttl: David Clowes investment verdict issued as Derby County told what is a 'great outcome'
arts.sum: Sky Sports pundit Don Goodman believes David Clowes' search for investment is a sensible move to make, but says the club must learn to walk before they can run in their quest to return to the Premier League. He's accepted that if Derby are to move forward, establish themselves in the Championship and eventually try and return to the Premier League, it will take additional investment.
